jd: Engaged in architecturally shaping a multi-tenant product on AWS, incorporating Google Calendar, Stripe,Slack integrations and federated authentications configured on OAuth
Offered guidance/ leadership to several teams in resolving technical challenges with in the organization
Initiated CI/CD automation through GitHub Actions, semantic releases, Slack notifications and related technologies resulting in a significant reduction in feature deployment time.
Actively involved in React, React Native and nodeJS development, advocating for Test-Driven Development(TDD) using Jest and React Testing Library.
Conducted random pair programming sessions to mentor juniors while following agile scrum
Contributed on full stack development with react/Vite based backoffice product, React Native app and GCP cloud functions with nodeJS as backend.

Revamped legacy React codebase in alignment with atomic architecture, implementing a range of optimizations such as lazy loading, error boundaries, suspense, custom hooks and more. This initiative led to a notable decrease in duplications, streamlining development efforts, and culminated in a 20% reduction in the total bundle size.
Implemented best practices, incorporating tools such as ESLint, lint-staged, Git hooks, and performing unit testing using Jest and React Testing Library (RTL).
Led a team of four with full stack development using react, react native and .net back-end.

Played a key role in implementing the integration of geolocation tracking with offline support for Android and iOS applications using React Native. This functionality became one of the most utilized features within the mobile app.
Employed Jest and cypress for front-end testing and utilized NUnitfor backend testing in the .NET environment.
Collaborated on pair programming sessions with norwegian team members.
Refactored ASP.net MVC application to Angular 2, which helped to increase user experience thus observed drastic increase in orders via millum web portal
Contributed on quick completion of millum commerce mobile app with ionic2 and angular2 with Typescript support in 3 months which resulted in a considerable increase of order submissions via mobile.
Played lead role/ Scrum master role of maintaining code quality through peer reviews and pull requests.
Played lead role of managing 10-12 team members on fast tracked development with scrum/ Kanban methodologies.
Restructured an ASP.NET application to use MVC with Razor views and subsequently integrating AngularJS to enhance and accommodate expanding dynamic functionalities
Utilized tools such as Jenkins, SonarQube to measure code coverage and to improve code quality.
